question: Who has been appointed as the new Non-Executive Chairman of Bajaj Finance Ltd?
explanation:
The present Non-Executive Chairman of Bajaj Finance Ltd, Rahul Bajaj has decided to step down from his post, with effect from July 31.
As per the Company, Rahul Bajaj will continue to serve as a Non-Executive Non-Independent Director. The Board of Directors has approved the appointment of present Vice Chairman Sanjiv Bajaj as the next Chairman, as a part of succession planning.
